defaultHighlightedValue.description:
The initial value of the highlighted item when opened.
Use when you don't need to control the highlighted value of the listbox.

defaultValue.description:
The initial default value of the listbox when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the value of the listbox.

disallowSelectAll.description: Whether to disallow selecting all items when `meta+a` is pressed

highlightedValue.description: The controlled key of the highlighted item

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  content: string
  label: string
  item(id: string | number): string
  itemGroup(id: string | number): string
  itemGroupLabel(id: string | number): string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the listbox. Useful for composition.

loopFocus.description: Whether to loop the keyboard navigation through the options

onHighlightChange.description: The callback fired when the highlighted item changes.

onSelect.description: Function called when an item is selected

onValueChange.description: The callback fired when the selected item changes.

scrollToIndexFn.description: Function to scroll to a specific index

selectionMode.description:
How multiple selection should behave in the listbox.

- `single`: The user can select a single item.
- `multiple`: The user can select multiple items without using modifier keys.
- `extended`: The user can select multiple items by using modifier keys.

selectOnHighlight.description: Whether to select the item when it is highlighted

typeahead.description: Whether to enable typeahead on the listbox

value.description: The controlled keys of the selected items

Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.

placeholder.description: Text to display when no value is selected.
